name: Prosciutto-Wrapped Asparagus and Mozzarella Parcels
author: Laka kuharica - Easy Cook
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper
directions: Fill a large bowl with cold water
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add asparagus and cook uncovered until blanched, about 2 minutes
Drain in a colander and immediately refresh in cold water for several minutes to stop the cooking process
Place 2 asparagus spears side by side and top with 2 half-slices of mozzarella cheese
Top cheese with 2 more asparagus spears
Wrap bundle in a slice of prosciutto so mozzarella cheese is tightly encased
Repeat with remaining asparagus, mozzarella cheese, and prosciutto to create 4 parcels
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Carefully fry parcels in the hot oil until prosciutto has crisped and mozzarella cheese oozes, about 5 minutes per side
